name: WipeCoin
overview:
WipeCoin protects and cleans your mobile. WipeCoin provide an unique and innovative cleaning mechanism for e.g. iPhone 4 /4S and other mobile phones with touchscreen.

How can you keep your mobile clean? Water – dangerous because it might damage the electronic circuits. Tissues – only smear the dirt but do not clean the screen. Cleaning solutions – cheap cleaning agents can damage the display surface. And you certainly don’t want to rub your phone dirt into your clothes.

This is why WipeCoin invented a unique and patented hard-case design with integrated anti-microbal microfiber-coated cleaning coin. You can easily clip the coin off your case, clean your touch-screen, and clip the coin back into the case. When the coin becomes dirty you can wash it.

WipeCoin is based in Germany, and the products are 100% “Made in Germany”. The production process follows strict German national quality standards. All products are manufactured using environmental-friendly materials and high-tech ultrasonic welding technology instead of cheap plastics and industrial glue.
